name: Duo.Ni
description:
Duo.Ni is a single-player arcade-style game in which the player must control 2 avatars at the same time whilst navigating a maze. Score increases faster the closer they are to each other, and allows for easier dodging as the avatars are smaller when together.

Don't let them hit the obstacles or each other!

This game was made in a single week by myself. All programming, images and audio were made by me.

Game 'finished' 30/09/2015. A remake is in the works, with the possibility of a mobile port.
